an4.50:4.1: “Mendicants, these four things obscure the sun and moon, so they don’t shine and glow and radiate.
an4.50:7.1: An eclipse of Rāhu, lord of demons …
an4.50:7.2: These are four things that obscure the sun and moon, so they don’t shine and glow and radiate.
an4.50:8.1: In the same way, these four things corrupt ascetics and brahmins, so they don’t shine and glow and radiate.
an4.50:8.3: There are some ascetics and brahmins who drink liquor, not avoiding drinking liquor.
an4.50:8.4: This is the first thing that corrupts ascetics and brahmins …
an4.50:9.1: There are some ascetics and brahmins who have sex, not avoiding sex.
an4.50:9.2: This is the second thing that corrupts ascetics and brahmins …
an4.50:10.1: There are some ascetics and brahmins who accept gold and money, not avoiding receiving gold and money.
an4.50:10.2: This is the third thing that corrupts ascetics and brahmins …
an4.50:11.1: There are some ascetics and brahmins who make a living the wrong way, not avoiding wrong livelihood.
an4.50:11.2: This is the fourth thing that corrupts ascetics and brahmins …
an4.50:11.3: These are four things that corrupt ascetics and brahmins, so they don’t shine and glow and radiate.”
an4.50:12.2: are plagued by greed and hate;
an4.50:13.6: make a living the wrong way.
an4.50:14.2: by the Buddha, Kinsman of the Sun.
an4.50:15.2: slaves of craving, full of attachments,
an4.50:15.4: and fill the horrifying charnel ground.”
